name: Mywave Singapore Pte Ltd
description: MYwave is one of the first HR companies in Malaysia with cloud computing capabilities. The company established since 2005, and focus in design, build and operate own suite of web-based HR management system. The web-based HR management system called EmplX was officially launched in 2009. EmplX focuses in helping companies to establish excellent process to manage their Human Capital on a real time basis. Our unique value proposition is that the usage is on a very affordable subscription model, and all types of HR policies (by company and by countries) are highly configurable.

enhanced_description: MYwave, established in 2005, is a pioneering HR company in Malaysia with cloud computing capabilities. Their flagship web-based HR management system, EmplX (launched in 2009), provides real-time Human Capital management with highly configurable HR policies that adapt to various company and country-specific regulations. Available on an affordable subscription model, EmplX offers comprehensive HR and Payroll functionalities, enabling workforce management anytime, anywhere. MYwave also provides extensive payroll outsourcing services, covering everything from employee onboarding to tax filing, and HR outsourcing and consultancy aimed at helping businesses attract, retain, and develop talent while ensuring compliance with all HR regulations. These solutions are designed to support small, large, and global enterprises, primarily serving Malaysian businesses.
